$comment: Non-wire JSON Schema for the org.peacprotocol/rfc9421-proof@0.1 extension. Conformance vectors validate against BOTH InteractionEvidenceV01Schema AND this extension schema.
title: RFC 9421 Proof Capture Extension
description: Records the result of verifying an RFC 9421 HTTP Message Signature on an http.request interaction.

result.description: Three-state verification outcome (aligned with DD-49 policy binding model)

reason.description: Machine-readable reason code. Well-known values: sig_valid, sig_expired, sig_future, sig_key_not_found, sig_alg_unsupported, sig_base_mismatch. Custom values use reverse-DNS prefixes.

items.description: HTTP message component identifier (e.g., @method, content-digest). MUST be names only, NEVER values.

covered_components.description: Ordered list of component identifiers from @signature-params. Contains names only, not values (privacy by construction).

label.description: Signature label from the Signature header (e.g., sig1)

alg.description: Signing algorithm from the signature parameters (e.g., ed25519, ecdsa-p256-sha256)

keyid.description: Key identifier from the signature parameters. MUST be opaque -- no secrets or PII.

created.description: Unix timestamp (seconds) from the created parameter

expires.description: Unix timestamp (seconds) from the expires parameter

nonce.description: Nonce value from the signature parameters

canonical_base_sha256.description: SHA-256 hex digest of the signature base string. Preferred over storing the base string itself (privacy).

verified_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when verification was performed
